delete-dialog.title: Delete Space
delete-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete space '{{name}}'?

allow.title: Allow SSH Access
allow.prompt: Please confirm that you wish to allow SSH access for space '{{name}}'.
allow.error: An error occurred allowing SSH Access for the space.

disallow.title: Disallow SSH Access
disallow.prompt: Please confirm that you wish to disallow SSH access for space '{{name}}'.
disallow.error: An error occurred disallowing SSH Access for the space.
